title: Lightwatch Log Event
description: Schema for log event ingestion. v2 adds event_id, trace_id, and schema_version for traceability and backward compatibility.

event_id.description: Client-supplied unique event identifier. Generated server-side if omitted.

trace_id.description: Distributed trace identifier for correlating events across services.

schema_version.description: Schema version number. Enables backward-compatible evolution.

tags.description: Indexed string key-value tags for filtering.

timestamp.description: Event timestamp (ISO 8601). Defaults to server time if omitted.
